t = input()
t = int(t)

for _ in range(t):
 n, m, x, y = input().split()
 n = int(n)
 m = int(m)
 x = int(x)
 y = int(y)
 n -= 1
 m -= 1
 flag = 0
 if n % x == 0 and m % y == 0:
  flag = 1
 n -= 1
 m -= 1
 if n >= 0 and m >= 0:
  if n % x == 0 and m % y == 0:
   flag = 1
 
 if flag == 1:
  print("Chefirnemo")
 else:
  print("Pofik")

t=int(input())
for i in range(t):
 n,m,x,y=list(map(int,input().split()))
 n1=n-1 
 m1=m-1 
 if n1%x==0 and m1%y==0:
  print("Chefirnemo")
 elif (n1-1)%x==0 and (m1-1)%y==0 and n1>0 and m1>0:
  print("Chefirnemo")
 #elif 
 #elif n1==1 and m1==1:

 else:
